answers.answer: Hi,The symptoms suggest of  Neuropathy . There could be many causes of nerve and muscle symptoms. They could be toxic nerve damage, Vitamin B 12 deficiency, Underactive thyroid, Raynaud’s phenomenon, Diabetes, nerve damage due to infections or tumours. Please go for nerve conduction studies, MRI of the brain, spine and extremities and consult a neurologist for diagnosis and treatment. Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!
